data.eml:eml: A review of the centipede genus Tidops Chamberlin (Scolopendromorpha, Scolopocryptopidae, Newportiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chagas-Junior, Amazonas (2011): A review of the centipede genus Tidops Chamberlin (Scolopendromorpha, Scolopocryptopidae, Newportiinae). International Journal of Myriapodology 5: 63-82, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/ijm.5.1649, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/ijm.5.1649
